title: Decoder: Barack Obama on AI, Free Speech, and the Future of the Internet
summary:
Happy Thanksgiving! While Kara and Scott take a break after a crazy week of news, enjoy this episode of Decoder, featuring Nilay Patel's interview with former President Obama on AI, free speech, regulation, and more.

Kara and Scott will return next week!
